item.description:
"Please consider joining me at this = 18 April Sunday 9:00am "First Hour Forum" at the Unitarian Universalist Society of Greater Springfield's 245 Porter Lake Drive facility where my friend and fellow Architects and Engineers for 9-11 Truth petition signer Wayne Coste will be making the case for controlled demolition of the twin towers and building seven - what, you ask, the heck ya mean about building seven!? - is this nuts or what?!Well, find out the story behind this"

from e-mail
item.name: First Hour Forum at the Unitarian Universalist Society
